Title: Halter Evening Dress with Sequins

----

Sku: CF086

----

Price: 

----

Saleprice: 

----

Bulkdiscount: 0

----

Sizes: L, M, S, XS

Colors: peach, black

----

Category: evening

----

Featured-image: CF086-black-halter-evening-dress-with-sequins_p.jpg

----

Description: A-line gown with a halter bodice. A peek-a-boo cut out accents the bodice. The gown is highlighted with sequins the come just past the waistline. There is a high split in the front of the skirt and the back of the gown has an open back with sequined straps.
